metadata.title: Weekly Memory Recap

slides.title: Summary
lines: This week was all about focus and growth. You tackled challenges with mindfulness and confidence, leading to some great achievements.

slides.title: Highlights
lines: - A focused block of deep work made me feel sharp and in control.
- I paused for a few deep breaths before starting a tough task.
- The key win was shipping a UI cleanup on the chat experience with Taylor.

slides.title: Looking Ahead
lines: Reflect on these moments as you move forward.
